actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the establishment of the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge and the establishment of a Federal-State management program for the conservation, protection, and enhancement of the tule elk and other species.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge in California. Establishes a Federal-State management program for the conservation, protection, and enhancement of tule elk and other species. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the establishment of the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge and the establishment of a Federal-State management program for the conservation, protection, and enhancement of the tule elk and other species.
